title: kazhalaDi tozhuvOr
sahitya:
kazhalaDi tozhuvOr gati peruvArE pazhaniyilE tigazhum parama pAvananin


anupallavi

  azhudu tuyaramurum aDiyArin vizhinIr pazhudupaDa viDAda vaDivazhaguDaiyavan


caraNam 1    vaiyagattE tunburum meyyanbaraik-kANa kaNNiraNDu pOdAdena panniraNDu koNDavan
kaiyIrArum sOrAdu peyyum koDaiyAlavar uyyak-krpai sheyyum vaiyApuri vElayyan
    caraNam 2    onru pOdAdenru kunru pala mIdu ninru enrumE evarkkum irangumiyalpAl
senra bhayamenbArai kanrin tAi pOl cintaiyaruL surandu vandaNaiyum kandan
